text: allatu ivarukku oru putaiyal aḷikkappaṭṭirukka vēṇṭāmā? Allatu atiliruntu uṇpataṟku (oru paḻat)tōṭṭam uṇṭākiyirukka vēṇṭāmā?" (Eṉṟum kūṟukiṉṟaṉar) aṉṟiyum, inta aniyāyak kārarkaḷ; (muḥmiṉkaḷai nōkki)"cūṉiyam ceyyappaṭṭa oru maṉitaraiyēyaṉṟi, vēṟevaraiyum nīṅkaḷ piṉpaṟṟavillai" eṉṟum kūṟukiṟārkaḷ
